analysis.description:
LuckyNumberService.checkNumber (/unique_contracts/0x2cbc88071f7c0eff084332b8acaa01f1f33eba50.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- pendingNumbers[_requestor].renderedNumber == 0 && pendingNumbers[_requestor].waitTime > 0

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0x2cbc88071f7c0eff084332b8acaa01f1f33eba50.sol#130-132:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x2cbc88071f7c0eff084332b8acaa01f1f33eba50.sol#54-60) should be declared external
